sub_interfaces.name: AS_CO_CP_dropdownField
sub_interfaces.description:
Generic single select dropdown field that handles read-only logic dynamically. 

For instances where a custom value should be displayed when the component is read-only, pass it into the "readOnlyValue" input.

data.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!displayValue: displayvalue(
    ri!value,
    ri!choiceValues,
    ri!choiceLabels,
    null
  ),
  if(
    ri!readOnly,
    rule!AS_CO_DSP_standardReadOnlyField(
      label: ri!label,
      instructions: ri!instructions,
      value: if(
        isnull(ri!readOnlyValue),
        local!displayValue,
        ri!readOnlyValue
      ),
      labelPosition: ri!labelPosition,
      helpTooltip: ri!helpTooltip,
      showWhen: ri!showWhen,
      accessibilityText: ri!accessibilityText
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dropdownField_v1"(
      label: ri!label,
      labelPosition: rule!AS_CO_UT_getLabelPosition(
        label: ri!label,
        labelPosition: ri!labelPosition,
        readOnly: ri!readOnly
      ),
      instructions: ri!instructions,
      helpTooltip: ri!helpTooltip,
      placeholder: if(
        ri!noPlaceholderLabel,
        null,
        rule!AS_CO_UT_formatFieldEntryPlaceHolder(
          wrapInMarkers: true,
          placeholder: rule!AS_CO_UT_replaceNull(
            nullableValue: ri!placeholderLabel,
            replacementValue: rule!AS_CO_UT_displayCommonObjectBundleLabel(
              bundleKey: "AS.CO.CommonObjects.lbl_co_2"
            )
          )
        )
      ),
      choiceLabels: ri!choiceLabels,
      choiceValues: ri!choiceValues,
      value: if(
        isnull(local!displayValue),
        null,
        ri!value
      ),
      saveInto: ri!saveInto,
      showWhen: if(isnull(ri!showWhen), true, ri!showWhen),
      required: if(ri!readOnly, false, ri!required),
      /* Updated requiredMessage parameter to show default validation text*/
      requiredMessage: rule!AS_CO_UT_displayRequiredMessage(
        label: ri!label,
        requiredMessage: ri!requiredMessage
      ),
      disabled: ri!disabled,
      validations: ri!validations,
      validationGroup: ri!validationGroup,
      accessibilityText: ri!accessibilityText
    )
  )
)

sub_interfaces.name: AS_CO_CP_integerField
sub_interfaces.description: Generic integer field to handle read-only logic dynamically.

data.sail_code:
if(ri!readOnly,
  rule!AS_CO_DSP_standardReadOnlyField(
    label: ri!label,
    instructions: ri!instructions,
    value: if(ri!noFormat,
      ri!value,
      rule!AS_CO_UT_fixed(
        number: ri!value,
        decimals: 0,
        no_commas: false
      )
    ),
    labelPosition: ri!labelPosition,
    helpTooltip: ri!helpTooltip,
    showWhen: ri!showWhen,
    accessibilityText: ri!accessibilityText
  ),
  #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_integerField"(
    label: ri!label,
    labelPosition: rule!AS_CO_UT_getLabelPosition(
      label: ri!label,
      labelPosition: ri!labelPosition,
      readOnly: ri!readOnly
    ),
    instructions: ri!instructions,
    helpTooltip: ri!helpTooltip,
    placeholder: rule!AS_CO_UT_formatFieldEntryPlaceHolder(placeholder: ri!placeholder),
    value: ri!value,
    saveInto: ri!saveInto,
    refreshAfter: ri!refreshAfter,
    showWhen: if(isnull(ri!showWhen), true, ri!showWhen),
    required: if(ri!readOnly, false, ri!required),
    /* Updated requiredMessage parameter to show default validation text*/
    requiredMessage: rule!AS_CO_UT_displayRequiredMessage(
      label: ri!label,
      requiredMessage: ri!requiredMessage
    ),
    readOnly: ri!readOnly,
    disabled: ri!disabled,
    masked: ri!masked,
    validations: a!flatten({
      ri!validations,
      rule!AS_CO_VD_numberValidation(
        value: ri!value,
        minSize: ri!minSize,
        maxSize: ri!maxSize
      )
    }),
    validationGroup: ri!validationGroup,
    align: ri!align,
    accessibilityText: ri!accessibilityText
  )
)

sub_interfaces.name: AS_CO_CP_multipleDropdownField
sub_interfaces.description:
Generic multi select dropdown field that handles read-only logic dynamically. 

For instances where a custom value should be displayed when the component is read-only, pass it into the "readOnlyValue" input.

data.sail_code:
with(
  local!displayValues: joinarray(#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
    items: ri!value,
    expression: displayvalue(fv!item, ri!choiceValues, ri!choiceLabels, null)
  ), ", "),
  local!i18nData:rule!AS_CO_I18N_UT_loadBundleFromFolder(
    bundleFolder: cons!AS_CO_I18N_FLD_INTERNATIONALIZATION_FILES,
    bundleNames: "AS.CO.CommonObjects"
  ),
  if(ri!readOnly,
    rule!AS_CO_DSP_standardReadOnlyField(
      label: ri!label,
      instructions: ri!instructions,
      value: if(isnull(ri!readOnlyValue),
        local!displayValues,
        ri!readOnlyValue
      ),
      labelPosition: ri!labelPosition,
      helpTooltip: ri!helpTooltip,
      showWhen: ri!showWhen,
      accessibilityText: ri!accessibilityText
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_multipleDropdownField_v1"(
      label: ri!label,
      labelPosition: rule!AS_CO_UT_getLabelPosition(
        label: ri!label,
        labelPosition: ri!labelPosition,
        readOnly: ri!readOnly
      ),
      instructions: ri!instructions,
      helpTooltip: ri!helpTooltip,
      placeholder: if(
        ri!noPlaceholderLabel,
        null,
        rule!AS_CO_UT_formatFieldEntryPlaceHolder(
          wrapInMarkers: true,
          placeholder: rule!AS_CO_UT_replaceNull(
            nullableValue: ri!placeholderLabel,
            replacementValue: rule!AS_CO_I18N_UT_displayLabel(
              i18nData: local!i18nData,
              bundleKey: "AS.CO.CommonObjects.lbl_co_2"
            )
          )
        )
      ),
      choiceLabels: ri!choiceLabels,
      choiceValues: ri!choiceValues,
      value: ri!value,
      saveInto: ri!saveInto,
      showWhen: ri!showWhen,
      required: ri!required,
      /* Updated requiredMessage parameter to show default validation text*/
      requiredMessage: rule!AS_CO_UT_displayRequiredMessage(
        label: ri!label,
        requiredMessage: ri!requiredMessage
      ),
      disabled: ri!disabled,
      validations: ri!validations,
      validationGroup: ri!validationGroup,
      accessibilityText: ri!accessibilityText
    )
  )
)

sub_interfaces.name: AS_CO_CP_pickerFieldGroups

data.sail_code:
if(
  ri!readOnly,
  #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_textField"(
    label: ri!label,
    labelPosition: if(
      isnull(
        ri!labelPosition
      ),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_getLabelPosition(
        readOnly: true
      ),
      ri!labelPosition
    ),
    value: if(
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(
        ri!value
      ),
      "-",
      rule!AS_CO_UT_separateListItemsInSentence(
        list: apply(
          group(
            _,
            "groupName"
          ),
          ri!value
        ),
        finalSeparator: "and"

    accessibilityText: ri!accessibilityText,
    readOnly: true
  ),

    maxSelections: ri!maxSelections,

sub_interfaces.name: AS_CO_INP_paragraphField
sub_interfaces.description: Standard wrapper for a!paragraphField()

data.sail_code:
if(
  ri!readOnly,
  rule!AS_CO_DSP_standardReadOnlyField(
    label: ri!label,
    instructions: ri!instructions,
    value: ri!value,
    labelPosition: ri!labelPosition,
    helpTooltip: ri!helpTooltip,
    showWhen: ri!showWhen,
    accessibilityText: ri!accessibilityText,
    align: null,
    showHyphenIfValueNull: ri!showHyphenIfValueNull
  ),
  #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_paragraphField"(
    label: ri!label,
    labelPosition: rule!AS_CO_UT_getLabelPosition(
      label: ri!label,
      labelPosition: ri!labelPosition,
      readOnly: false
    ),
    height: ri!height,
    instructions: ri!instructions,
    helpTooltip: ri!helpTooltip,
    placeholder: ri!placeholder,
    value: ri!value,
    /* We are using nested saveIntos to automatically perform a trim on any value */
    /* before executing the actual saves */
    /* Saves can be nested in this format to allow for better reusability */
    saveInto: a!save(ri!saveInto, trim(save!value)),
    showWhen: ri!showWhen,
    required: if(ri!readOnly, false, ri!required),
    /* Updated requiredMessage parameter to show default validation text*/
    requiredMessage: rule!AS_CO_UT_displayRequiredMessage(
      label: ri!label,
      requiredMessage: ri!requiredMessage
    ),
    readOnly: ri!readOnly,
    disabled: ri!disabled,
    validations: if(
      ri!readOnly,
      {},
      a!flatten(
        {
          ri!validations,
          rule!AS_CO_VD_textValidation(value: ri!value, maxLength: ri!maxLength)
        }
      )
    ),
    validationGroup: ri!validationGroup,
    accessibilitytext: ri!accessibilityText,
    characterLimit: ri!characterLimit,
    showCharacterCount: ri!showCharacterCount
  )
)

sub_interfaces.name: AS_GSS_CPS_richTextWithShowMoreLess
sub_interfaces.description: Generic interface for displaying rich text fields

data.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!shortenIfLongerThanLen: a!defaultValue(
    value: ri!shortenIfLongerThanLen,
    default: ri!shortenToLen
  ),
  local!showLess: true,
  #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextDisplayField"(
    label: a!defaultValue(ri!label, null),
    labelPosition: a!defaultValue(ri!labelPosition, "COLLAPSED"),
    instructions: ri!instructions,
    helpTooltip: ri!helpToolTip,
    value: a!match(
      value: ri!text,
      whenTrue: and(
        a!isNullorEmpty(fv!value),
        ri!showHyphen = true
      ),
      then: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(text: "-", color: "STANDARD"),
      whenTrue: a!isNullorEmpty(fv!value),
      then: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(text: "", color: "STANDARD"),
      whenTrue: or(
        a!isNullorEmpty(ri!shortenToLen),
        ri!shortenToLen = 0
      ),
      then: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(text: fv!value, color: "STANDARD"),
      default: if(
        len(ri!text) <= local!shortenIfLongerThanLen,
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(
          text: ri!text,
          color: "STANDARD",
          size: ri!textSize
        ),
        if(
          local!showLess = true,
          {
            #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(
              text: trim(
                rule!AS_CO_UT_left(text: ri!text, numChars: ri!shortenToLen)
              ) & "... ",
              color: ri!textColor,
              size: ri!textSize
            ),
            #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(
              color: ri!linkColor,
              text: "More",
              link: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dynamicLink"(
                label: if(
                  cons!AS_GSS_TOGGLE_AUTOMATION_TESTING_ENABLED,
                  "Show More",
                  null
                ),
                saveInto: a!save(local!showLess, false)
              ),
              style: "STRONG",
              size: ri!textSize
            )
          },
          {
            #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(
              text: ri!text & " ",
              color: ri!textColor,
              size: ri!textSize
            ),
            #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(
              color: ri!linkColor,
              text: "Less",
              link: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dynamicLink"(
                label: if(
                  cons!AS_GSS_TOGGLE_AUTOMATION_TESTING_ENABLED,
                  "Show Less",
                  null
                ),
                saveInto: a!save(local!showLess, true)
              ),
              style: "STRONG",
              size: ri!textSize
            )
          }
        )
      )
    ),
    preventWrapping: ri!preventWrapping,
    tooltip: ri!tooltip,
    showWhen: ri!showWhen,
    align: ri!align,
    marginAbove: ri!marginAbove,
    marginBelow: a!defaultValue(ri!marginBelow, "NONE"),
  )
)

sub_interfaces.name: AS_GSS_CP_refDataField
sub_interfaces.description: Standard field for selecting or display reference data. Takes in parameters such as `readOnly` and `selectionType` to help with ease-of-use.

data.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!refOptions: rule!AS_GSS_UT_filterRefDataForSelection(
    refData: ri!refData,
    currentValue: ri!value,
    refType: ri!refType,
    skipInactiveAppend: ri!skipInactiveAppend
  ),
  local!currentValue: rule!AS_CO_UT_filterCdtByField(
    cdt: local!refOptions,
    field: "refDataId",
    value: ri!value.refDataId
  ),
  local!readOnlyValue: joinarray(
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
      items: ri!value,
      expression: rule!AS_GSS_UT_displayRefLabel(
        refData: fv!item
      )
    ),
    ", "
  ),
  if(
    ri!allowMultipleSelection,
    rule!AS_CO_CP_multipleDropdownField(
      label: ri!label,
      labelPosition: ri!labelPosition,
      instructions: ri!instructions,
      required: ri!required,
      readOnly: ri!readOnly,
      disabled: ri!disabled,
      choiceLabels: local!refOptions.refLabel,
      choiceValues: local!refOptions,
      value: local!currentValue,
      validations: ri!validations,
      saveInto: ri!saveInto,
      validationGroup: ri!validationGroup,

a!localVariables(
  local!loggedInUser: loggedInUser(),
  local!triggerRefresh: a!refreshVariable(
    value: now(),
    refreshAfter: "RECORD_ACTION"
  ),
  local!pagingInfo: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_pagingInfo"(
    startIndex: 1,
    batchSize: cons!AS_GSS_BATCH_SIZE_FOR_EVALUATIONS_IN_HOME_PAGE
  ),

    executeWhen: true(),
    pagingInfo: local!pagingInfo,
    triggerRefresh: local!triggerRefresh
  ),
  local!selectedTasks: a!refreshVariable(
    value: null,
    refreshOnVarChange: { local!triggerRefresh }
  ),
  local!canUserCreateEvalaution: rule!AS_GSS_BL_getVisibilityToCreateEvaluation(user: local!loggedInUser),
  local!isHomePage: true(),
  rule!AS_GSS_HCL_evaluationsLandingPage(
    header: rule!AS_GSS_CPS_landingPageHeader(
      i18nData: local!i18nData,
      showCreateEvaluationAction: and(
        local!canUserCreateEvalaution,
        a!isNotNullOrEmpty(value: local!evaluations.data)
      )
    ),
    contents: {
      /*My Active Evaluations*/
      rule!AS_GSS_CPS_activeEvaluations(
        evaluations: local!evaluations,
        isEvaluator: local!isEvaluator,
        pagingInfo: local!pagingInfo,
        i18nData: local!i18nData,
        loggedInUser: local!loggedInUser,
        triggerRefresh: local!triggerRefresh,
        showCreateEvaluationAction: local!canUserCreateEvalaution
      ),
      /*My Tasks*/
      rule!AS_GSS_CPS_activeTasks(
        selectedTasks: local!selectedTasks,
        user: local!loggedInUser,
        i18nData: local!i18nData,
        isEvaluator: local!isEvaluator,
        isHomePage: local!isHomePage,
        showWhen: true(),
        triggerRefresh: local!triggerRefresh
      )
    }
  )
)

expression_rules.name: AS_CO_UT_separateListItemsInSentence
expression_rules.description: Concatenates a list into a sentence with a configurable final separator, and/or

data.sail_code:
with(
  local!list: rule!AS_CO_UT_rejectNullValuesFromArray(array: ri!list),
  if(
    count(local!list) <= 1,
    concat(local!list),
    if(
      count(local!list) = 2,
      concat(
        local!list[1],
        " ",
        ri!finalSeparator,
        " ",
        local!list[2]
      ),
      concat(
        joinarray(
          remove(local!list, count(local!list)),
          ", "
        ),
        ", ",
        ri!finalSeparator,
        " ",
        local!list[count(local!list)]
      )
    )
  )
)
data.definition:
with(
  local!list: rule!AS_CO_UT_rejectNullValuesFromArray(array: ri!list),
  if(
    count(local!list) <= 1,
    concat(local!list),
    if(
      count(local!list) = 2,
      concat(
        local!list[1],
        " ",
        ri!finalSeparator,
        " ",
        local!list[2]
      ),
      concat(
        joinarray(
          remove(local!list, count(local!list)),
          ", "
        ),
        ", ",
        ri!finalSeparator,
        " ",
        local!list[count(local!list)]
      )
    )
  )
)

data.sail_code:
rule!AS_CO_UT_queryEntity(
  entity: cons!AS_GSS_ENT_EVALUATION,
  entityType: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:GSS}AS_GSS_Evaluation',
  returnType: ri!returnType,
  executeWhen: and(
    ri!executeWhen,
    or(
      any(
        rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(_),
        {
          ri!additionalFilters,
          ri!logicalExpression,
          ri!aggregation
        }
      ),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!evaluationId),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!evaluationNumber)
    )
  ),
  /* To ensure proper null checks, we'll force all queryFilter values to not be null */
  logicalExpression: ri!logicalExpression,
  pagingInfo: ri!pagingInfo,
  triggerRefresh: ri!triggerRefresh,
  filters: {
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "evaluationId",
      operator: "in",
      value: ri!evaluationId
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "evaluationNumber",
      operator: "in",
      value: ri!evaluationNumber
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "evaluationStatus.refDataId",
      operator: "in",
      value: {
        cons!AS_GSS_REF_ID_EVALUATION_STATUS_SETTING_UP,
        cons!AS_GSS_REF_ID_EVALUATION_STATUS_INPROGRESS,
        cons!AS_GSS_REF_ID_EVALUATION_STATUS_COMPLETE
      }
    ),
    ri!additionalFilters
  },
  aggregation: ri!aggregation,
  excludeNestedCdts: ri!excludeNestedCdts,
  sort: ri!sort
)

expression_rules.name: AS_CO_UT_triggerRefresh
expression_rules.description: This rule takes in a local variable called local!triggerRefresh and changes the value of it. This is used to refresh a!refreshVariable() in some scenarios.

data.sail_code:
/*

Use this rule in any saveInto to update the value of a local variable triggerRefresh.

It should be used in conjunction with a local variable configured to refresh
whenever this rule is executed. To configure the local variable you intend to refresh,
set it up like this:

a!localVariables(
  local!triggerRefresh: now(),

  local!data: a!refreshVariable(
    value: ..(value definition)..,
    refreshOnVarChange: local!triggerRefresh
  )
)

*/

a!save(
  ri!triggerRefresh,
  now()
)

expression_rules.name: AS_ADT_UT_determineAuditActionCode
expression_rules.description: Given a newObject, an oldObject, and the auditConfig, determines the auditActionCode

data.sail_code:
choose(
  where(
    {
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!externalAction),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(index(ri!originalObject, ri!auditConfig.idField, null)),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(index(ri!newObject, ri!auditConfig.idField, null)),
      toboolean(index(ri!originalObject, "isActive", 1)) = toboolean(index(ri!newObject, "isActive", 1)),
      toboolean(index(ri!originalObject, "isActive", false)),
      toboolean(index(ri!newObject, "isActive", true))
    }
  )[1],
  ri!externalAction,
  cons!AS_ADT_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_ADD,
  cons!AS_ADT_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_DELETE,
  cons!AS_ADT_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_MODIFY,
  cons!AS_ADT_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_DEACTIVATE,
  cons!AS_ADT_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_REACTIVATE
)
data.definition:
choose(
  where(
    {
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!externalAction),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(index(ri!originalObject, ri!auditConfig.idField, null)),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(index(ri!newObject, ri!auditConfig.idField, null)),
      toboolean(index(ri!originalObject, "isActive", 1)) = toboolean(index(ri!newObject, "isActive", 1)),
      toboolean(index(ri!originalObject, "isActive", false)),
      toboolean(index(ri!newObject, "isActive", true))
    }
  )[1],
  ri!externalAction,
  cons!AS_ADT_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_ADD,
  cons!AS_ADT_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_DELETE,
  cons!AS_ADT_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_MODIFY,
  cons!AS_ADT_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_DEACTIVATE,
  cons!AS_ADT_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_REACTIVATE

expression_rules.name: AS_GSS_UT_checkIfTotalWeightEqualsUpperLimit
expression_rules.description: Returns true if the provided factors weights sum to the provided weight, or the default of 100, with some leniency to account for summing fractions

data.sail_code:
/*
Note:
If total parent factor weight reaches anywhere between
99.95 and 100, we round off the total parent factor weight
to 100.

If total subfactor weight reaches anywhere between (x-1).95 and x,
where "X" is the parent factor weight, we round off the total
subfactor weight to x.
*/
a!localVariables(
  local!upperLimit: a!defaultValue(
    value: ri!parentFactorWeight,
    default: cons!AS_GSS_DEC_FACTOR_WEIGHT_TOTAL_POINTS
  ),
  and(
    (local!upperLimit - ri!totalWeight) >= 0,
    (local!upperLimit - ri!totalWeight) <= 0.05
  )
)
data.definition:
/*
Note: 
If total parent factor weight reaches anywhere between 
99.95 and 100, we round off the total parent factor weight 
to 100.

If total subfactor weight reaches anywhere between (x-1).95 and x,
where "X" is the parent factor weight, we round off the total 
subfactor weight to x. 
*/
a!localVariables(
  local!upperLimit: a!defaultValue(
    value: ri!parentFactorWeight,
    default: cons!AS_GSS_DEC_FACTOR_WEIGHT_TOTAL_POINTS
  ),
  and(
    (local!upperLimit - ri!totalWeight) >= 0,
    (local!upperLimit - ri!totalWeight) <= 0.05
  )
)

inputs.name: parentFactorWeight
inputs.description:
If a value is passed, checks whether total sum of subfactors weights matches its parent factor weight.
If a value is NOT passed, checks whether total sum of parent factors weights matches 100.

test_cases.test_name: Parent Factor - When total weight is 100, but atleast one of the weights is null or 0
SubFactor - When total weight matches factor weight, but atleast one of the weights is null or 0
SubFactor - When total weight matches factor weight and no weights are null or 0
Parent Factor - When total weight is 100 and no weights are null or 0

  taskId: null,

  taskRefId: ri!templateTask.taskRef.taskRefId,
  taskName: ri!templateTask.taskRef.taskName,
  taskDesc: ri!templateTask.taskDesc,
  taskBehaviorType: ri!templateTask.taskRef.taskBehaviorType,
  taskCategory: ri!templateTask.taskRef.taskCategory,
  groupAssignee: ri!templateTask.groupAssignee,
  userAssignee: null,
  taskStatus: null,
  docUploadContext: ri!templateTask.taskRef.docUploadContext,
  taskPrecedents: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
    items: ri!templateTask.templateTaskPrecedents,

      /* Within process AS TMG Process Setup, within rule AS_GSS_TMG_UT_setTaskPrecedentsOnTasksAfterInitialWrite, */

          rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(fv!item.groupId_precedent),
          fv!item.groupId_precedent,
          fv!item.taskRefId_precedent
        )
      )
    )
  ),
  availableDatetime: null,
  dueDate: if(
    and(
      ri!calculateDueDate = true,
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(ri!templateTask.templateTaskPrecedents)
    ),
    rule!AS_GSS_TMG_BL_getDueDateBasedOnDuration(templateTask: ri!templateTask),

  ),
  duration: ri!templateTask.duration,
  durationUnit: ri!templateTask.durationUnit,
  noOfDaysFromStart: ri!templateTask.noOfDaysFromStart,
  completedBy: null,
  completedDatetime: null,
  vendor: null,
  criteria: null,
  createdBy: null,
  createdDatetime: null,
  modifiedBy: null,
  modifiedDatetime: null
)

expression_rules.name: AS_GSS_UT_isBlank
expression_rules.description: Returns true if the value is null, CDT with all null fields, an empty string, string with only spaces, list of null values or an empty list. Otherwise returns false.

data.sail_code:
/*
This rule null checks below scenarios,

-- null value
-- an empty list
-- an empty string
-- list of null values
-- all fields of the CDT are null
      While passing a CDT, make sure ri!checkIfAllCdtFieldsAreNull is TRUE to handle
    this scenario
-- string with only spaces
*/
a!localVariables(
  local!checkIfAllCdtFieldsAreNull: a!defaultValue(
    value: ri!checkIfAllCdtFieldsAreNull,
    default: false
  ),
  local!keys: if(
    local!checkIfAllCdtFieldsAreNull,
    a!keys(value: index(ri!value, 1, null)),
    null
  ),
  local!indicesOfCdtsWhereAllFieldsAreNull: if(
    local!checkIfAllCdtFieldsAreNull,
    rule!AS_CO_UT_rejectNullValuesFromArray(
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
        rule!AS_CO_UT_castToMapList(ri!value),
        a!localVariables(
          local!currentItem: fv!item,
          local!currentIndex: fv!index,
          if(
            length(
              a!flatten(
                #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
                  local!keys,
                  rule!AS_CO_UT_whereContains(
                    values: null,
                    array: rule!AS_CO_UT_indexPath(
                      cdt: a!flatten(local!currentItem),
                      field: fv!item
                    )
                  )
                )
              )
            ) = length(local!keys),
            local!currentIndex,
            null
          )
        )
      )
    ),
    null
  ),
  local!filteredCdt: if(
    local!checkIfAllCdtFieldsAreNull,
    remove(
      a!flatten(ri!value),
      local!indicesOfCdtsWhereAllFieldsAreNull
    ),
    null
  ),
  cast(
    'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Boolean',
    or(
      length(a!flatten(ri!value)) = 0,
      a!isNullOrEmpty(
        if(
          local!checkIfAllCdtFieldsAreNull,
          local!filteredCdt,
          trim(ri!value)
        )
      )
    )
  )
)
data.definition:
/*
This rule null checks below scenarios, 

-- null value
-- an empty list
-- an empty string
-- list of null values
-- all fields of the CDT are null
      While passing a CDT, make sure ri!checkIfAllCdtFieldsAreNull is TRUE to handle
    this scenario
-- string with only spaces
*/
a!localVariables(
  local!checkIfAllCdtFieldsAreNull: a!defaultValue(
    value: ri!checkIfAllCdtFieldsAreNull, 
    default: false
  ),
  local!keys: if(
    local!checkIfAllCdtFieldsAreNull,
    a!keys(value: index(ri!value, 1, null)),
    null
  ),
  local!indicesOfCdtsWhereAllFieldsAreNull: if(
    local!checkIfAllCdtFieldsAreNull,
    rule!AS_CO_UT_rejectNullValuesFromArray(
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
        rule!AS_CO_UT_castToMapList(ri!value),
        a!localVariables(
          local!currentItem: fv!item,
          local!currentIndex: fv!index,
          if(
            length(
              a!flatten(
                #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
                  local!keys,
                  rule!AS_CO_UT_whereContains(
                    values: null,
                    array: rule!AS_CO_UT_indexPath(
                      cdt: a!flatten(local!currentItem),
                      field: fv!item
                    )
                  )
                )
              )
            ) = length(local!keys),
            local!currentIndex,
            null
          )
        )
      )
    ),
    null
  ),
  local!filteredCdt: if(
    local!checkIfAllCdtFieldsAreNull,
    remove(
      a!flatten(ri!value),
      local!indicesOfCdtsWhereAllFieldsAreNull
    ),
    null
  ),
  cast(
    'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Boolean',
    or(
      length(a!flatten(ri!value)) = 0,
      a!isNullOrEmpty(
        if(
          local!checkIfAllCdtFieldsAreNull,
          local!filteredCdt,
          trim(ri!value)
        )
      )
    )
  )
)

expression_rules.name: AS_CO_I18N_UT_displayLabel
expression_rules.description: Displays a label by the `bundleKey` from passed in bundle data, optionally accepts arguments

data.sail_code:
cast(
  'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Text',
  with(
    local!bundleKeyParse: rule!AS_CO_I18N_UT_parseBundleKey(bundleKey: ri!bundleKey),
    local!label: if(
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(local!bundleKeyParse.bundleName),
      ri!i18nData[local!bundleKeyParse.labelKey],
      ri!i18nData[local!bundleKeyParse.bundleName][local!bundleKeyParse.labelKey]
    ),
    local!updatedLabel: rule!AS_CO_UT_replaceNull(
      nullableValue: local!label,
      replacementValue: ri!bundleKey
    ),
    local!updatedLabelForArguments: if(
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(ri!arguments),
      local!updatedLabel,
      reduce(
        rule!AS_CO_I18N_UT_replaceArgument(input: _, index: _, arguments: ri!arguments),
        local!updatedLabel,
        enumerate(count(ri!arguments)) + 1
      )
    ),
    local!updatedLabelForArguments
  )
)

expression_rules.name: AS_GSS_UT_queryRecordByIdentifier
expression_rules.description: Helper rule to execute record queries with minimal overhead

data.sail_code:
/*

PLEASE REFER TO THE BOTTOM OF THIS RULE FOR INSTRUCTIONS ON HOW TO USE

Please DO NOT auto-format this rule

*/
a!localVariables(
  /*Determine the castResultToType*/
  local!castResultToType: a!defaultValue(ri!castToCdtType, ri!recordType),
  /*Execute the query*/
  local!queryResult: a!refreshVariable(
    value: if(
      ri!executeWhen = false,
      null(ri!recordType),
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryRecordByIdentifier"(
        recordType: ri!recordType,
        identifier: ri!identifier,
        fields: {
          ri!fields,
          ri!relatedRecordData.relationship
        },
        relatedRecordData: ri!relatedRecordData
      )
    ),
    refreshOnVarChange: ri!triggerRefresh,
    refreshAfter: { "RECORD_ACTION" }
  ),
  rule!AS_CO_UT_cast(
    type: local!castResultToType,
    value: local!queryResult
  )
)/*

DOCUMENTATION

This rule is designed to minimize the overhead with querying data and then casting the result


Required Inputs:

1. recordType
- This is a recordtype! input of the data type to be queried against

2. identifier
- The primary key of the record type which needs to be queried

Optional Inputs:

3. executeWhen
- The query will not execute if this is false, the query will execute if this is true or null
-- This is meant to operate in a similar manner to the showWhen parameter of components
- Use this to skip execution of a query without needing to wrap if() statements around the rule
-- Examples of this would be to skip querying if your filter value is a null ID
- If the query does not execute, this will return a null value whose type is based on the returnType input

4. triggerRefresh
- By default, the query will always re-execute whenever any inputs change
- However, by updating the value of triggerRefresh, you can also trigger a re-execution even if none of the other inputs change (e.g. after a record action)

5. castToCdtType
- Any cdt type to the cast the result set.

6. fields
- The record fields that need to be queried

7. relatedRecordData
- the relatedRecordData in which the filters and limit can be specified for each relationship

*/
data.definition:
/*

PLEASE REFER TO THE BOTTOM OF THIS RULE FOR INSTRUCTIONS ON HOW TO USE

Please DO NOT auto-format this rule

*/
a!localVariables(
  /*Determine the castResultToType*/
  local!castResultToType: a!defaultValue(ri!castToCdtType, ri!recordType),
  /*Execute the query*/
  local!queryResult: a!refreshVariable(
    value: if(
      ri!executeWhen = false,
      null(ri!recordType),
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryRecordByIdentifier"(
        recordType: ri!recordType,
        identifier: ri!identifier,
        fields: {
          ri!fields,
          ri!relatedRecordData.relationship
        },
        relatedRecordData: ri!relatedRecordData
      )
    ),
    refreshOnVarChange: ri!triggerRefresh,
    refreshAfter: { "RECORD_ACTION" }
  ),
  rule!AS_CO_UT_cast(
    type: local!castResultToType,
    value: local!queryResult
  )
)/*

DOCUMENTATION

This rule is designed to minimize the overhead with querying data and then casting the result


Required Inputs:

1. recordType
- This is a recordtype! input of the data type to be queried against

2. identifier
- The primary key of the record type which needs to be queried

Optional Inputs:

3. executeWhen
- The query will not execute if this is false, the query will execute if this is true or null
-- This is meant to operate in a similar manner to the showWhen parameter of components
- Use this to skip execution of a query without needing to wrap if() statements around the rule
-- Examples of this would be to skip querying if your filter value is a null ID
- If the query does not execute, this will return a null value whose type is based on the returnType input

4. triggerRefresh
- By default, the query will always re-execute whenever any inputs change
- However, by updating the value of triggerRefresh, you can also trigger a re-execution even if none of the other inputs change (e.g. after a record action)

6. fields

7. relatedRecordData

expression_rules.name: AS_GSS_QR_getEvaluation
expression_rules.description: Returns evaluation synced record based on the given filter set

data.sail_code:
rule!AS_CO_UT_queryRecord(
  recordType: recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD,
  returnType: ri!returnType,
  executeWhen: ri!executeWhen,
  triggerRefresh: ri!triggerRefresh,
  logicalExpression: ri!logicalExpression,
  pagingInfo: ri!pagingInfo,
  aggregationFields: ri!aggregationFields,
  fields: ri!fields,
  relatedRecordData: ri!relatedRecordData,
  filters: {
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.evaluationId,
      operator: "in",
      value: ri!evaluationId
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.evaluationNumber,
      operator: "in",
      value: ri!evaluationNumber
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.evaluationStatusId,
      operator: "in",
      value: {
        cons!AS_GSS_REF_ID_EVALUATION_STATUS_SETTING_UP,
        cons!AS_GSS_REF_ID_EVALUATION_STATUS_INPROGRESS,
        cons!AS_GSS_REF_ID_EVALUATION_STATUS_COMPLETE
      }
    ),
    ri!additionalFilters
  },
  sort: ri!sort
)

expression_rules.name: AS_GSS_UT_returnUserBusinessRole
expression_rules.description: Returns the business group of a user

data.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!businessRoles: rule!AS_CO_UT_cast(
    type: 'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Group?list',
    value: rule!AS_CO_UT_replaceNull(
      nullableValue: rule!AS_CO_UT_returnGroupsUserIsAMemberOf(
        parentGroup: cons!AS_GSS_GRP_BUSINESS_ROLES,
        user: ri!user,
        onlyCheckDirectMemberGroupsOfParent: true
      ),
      replacementValue: ""
    )
  ),
  if(
    contains(
      local!businessRoles,
      cons!AS_GAM_GRP_CONTRACTING_OFFICER
    ),
    cons!AS_GAM_GRP_CONTRACTING_OFFICER,
    contains(
      local!businessRoles,
      cons!AS_GAM_GRP_CONTRACT_SPECIALIST
    ),
    cons!AS_GAM_GRP_CONTRACT_SPECIALIST,
    rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(local!businessRoles),
    null,
    local!businessRoles[1]
  )
)
data.definition:
a!localVariables(
  local!businessRoles: rule!AS_CO_UT_cast(
    type: 'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Group?list',
    value: rule!AS_CO_UT_replaceNull(
      nullableValue: rule!AS_CO_UT_returnGroupsUserIsAMemberOf(
        parentGroup: cons!AS_GSS_GRP_BUSINESS_ROLES,
        user: ri!user,
        onlyCheckDirectMemberGroupsOfParent: true
      ),
      replacementValue: ""
    )
  ),
  if(
    contains(
      local!businessRoles,
      cons!AS_GAM_GRP_CONTRACTING_OFFICER
    ),
    cons!AS_GAM_GRP_CONTRACTING_OFFICER,
    contains(
      local!businessRoles,
      cons!AS_GAM_GRP_CONTRACT_SPECIALIST
    ),
    cons!AS_GAM_GRP_CONTRACT_SPECIALIST,
    rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(local!businessRoles),
    null,
    local!businessRoles[1]
  )
)

Removes the given task index from the list of tasks, removes the index wherever it is found as a precedent of any task, and decrements all indexes that are greater than that of the removed task wherever they are referenced as precedents.

a!localVariables(
  local!taskRefData: rule!AS_GSS_TMG_QE_getTaskRefs(
    taskRefId: cons!AS_GSS_TMG_TASK_REF_ID_CHEKLIST_SETUP,
    returnType: cons!AS_CO_ENUM_QE_RETURN_TYPE_SINGLE_OBJECT
  ),
  #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
    items: ri!evaluations,
    expression: a!localVariables(
      local!businessRole: rule!AS_GSS_UT_returnUserBusinessRole(user: ri!initiator),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_captureMetadata(
        cdt: rule!AS_CO_UT_updateCdtFields(
          cdt: rule!AS_GSS_TMG_CDT_mapTaskRefToRuntimeTask(taskRef: local!taskRefData),
          fields: {
            "evaluation",
            "taskDesc",
            "userAssignee",
            "groupAssignee",
            "availableDatetime",
            "taskStatus.taskStatusId"
          },
          newValues: {
            fv!item,
            cons!AS_GSS_TXT_TASK_DESC_FOR_PROCESS_SETUP,
            ri!initiator,
            local!businessRole,
            now(),
            cons!AS_GSS_TMG_REF_ID_TASK_STATUS_ASSIGNED
          }
        ),
        modifiedBy: ri!initiator
      )
    )
  )
)

views.ui_expr:
rule!AS_GSS_CPS_viewFactors(
  evaluationId: rv!record[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_RECORD.evaluationId],
  loggedInUser: loggedInUser()
)

rule!AS_GSS_CPS_evaluationRatingsTab(
  evaluationId:rv!identifier ,
  evaluationFactors: rule!AS_GSS_QE_getEvaluationCriteria(
    evaluationId: rv!identifier,
    additionalFilters: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "parentCriteriaId",
      operator: "is null"
    ),
    returnType: cons!AS_CO_ENUM_QE_RETURN_TYPE_OBJECT_ARRAY,
    getActiveAndInactive: false()
  ),
  evaluationVendors: rule!AS_GSS_QE_getEvaluationVendor(
    evaluationId: rv!identifier,
    returnType: cons!AS_CO_ENUM_QE_RETURN_TYPE_OBJECT_ARRAY,
    getActiveAndInactive: false()
  ),
  evaluationSubFactors: rule!AS_GSS_QE_getEvaluationCriteria(
    evaluationId: rv!identifier,
    additionalFilters: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "parentCriteriaId",
      operator: "not null"
    ),
    returnType: cons!AS_CO_ENUM_QE_RETURN_TYPE_OBJECT_ARRAY,
    getActiveAndInactive: false()
  )
)

rule!AS_GSS_CPS_consensusReportView(
  evaluationId: rv!record[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_RECORD.evaluationId],
  loggedInUser: loggedInUser()
)

rule!AS_GSS_FM_evaluationDocumentsTab(evaluationId:
rv!record[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_RECORD.evaluationId])

rule!AS_GSS_FM_evaluationAuditHistory(
  evaluation: rule!AS_GSS_QE_getEvaluation(
    evaluationId: rv!record[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_RECORD.evaluationId],
    returnType: cons!AS_CO_ENUM_QE_RETURN_TYPE_SINGLE_OBJECT
  ),
  evaluationPhases: rule!AS_GSS_QE_getEvaluationPhases(
    returnType: cons!AS_CO_ENUM_QE_RETURN_TYPE_OBJECT_ARRAY,
    evaluationId: rv!record[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_RECORD.evaluationId],
    getActiveAndInactive: true
  ),
  evaluationVendors: rule!AS_GSS_QE_getEvaluationVendor(
    evaluationId: rv!record[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_RECORD.evaluationId],
    returnType: cons!AS_CO_ENUM_QE_RETURN_TYPE_OBJECT_ARRAY,
    getActiveAndInactive: true
  ),
  evaluationCriterias: rule!AS_GSS_QE_getEvaluationCriteria(
    returnType: cons!AS_CO_ENUM_QE_RETURN_TYPE_OBJECT_ARRAY,
    evaluationId: rv!record[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_RECORD.evaluationId],
    getActiveAndInactive: true
  ),
  evaluatorTeams: rule!AS_GSS_QE_getEvaluatorTeam(
    returnType: cons!AS_CO_ENUM_QE_RETURN_TYPE_OBJECT_ARRAY,
    evaluationId: rv!record[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_RECORD.evaluationId],
    getActiveAndInactive: true
  ),
  evaluationDocs:rule!AS_GSS_QE_getEvaluationDocuments(
    returnType: cons!AS_CO_ENUM_QE_RETURN_TYPE_OBJECT_ARRAY,
    evaluationId: rv!record[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_RECORD.evaluationId],
    fetchAll: true()
  )
)
